documentation.text:
@dev function to get the list of bids on a given loan
 @param _loanID loan for which the user want to see the bids

@dev Borrower can close a loan when the loan got enough bids or simply withdraw the loan request
 @param _loanID the loan to which the bid is being made

@dev helper function to get the length of a string from storage
 @param str a string
@dev fallback function to handle wrong contract usage

devdoc.author: Samir Yahiaoui
devdoc.details: Request a loan for a given amount and allow a syndicate of borrowers to bid on the loan The process implemented in this contract is a simulation only and no funds transfer occur A potential borrower enters a loan request and various lenders subscribe to the loan committing  slices of the loans at an interest rate that corresponds to their perception of the risk

getBids(uint256).details: function to get the list of bids on a given loan

params._loanID: loan for which the user want to see the bids

loanClose(uint256).details: Borrower can close a loan when the loan got enough bids or simply withdraw the loan request

params._loanID: the loan to which the bid is being made

makeBid(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Lender makes a bid on a loan

params._loanAmount: is the amount the lender is willing to lend. This is required to be positive.
params._rate: is the rate at which the lender is willing to lend

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._lein: Legal Entity Identifier of borrower or borrower's name
Legal Entity Identifier of lender or lender's name

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestLoan(uint256).details: borrower request a loan (amount required to be positive)

retire(address).details: set flag that allows the owner to retire the contract

params._address: address that must be that of the contract owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SyndicatedLoan
